>After the first use, though, mind control is much less effective. I 
couldn't say why... it just controls fewer enemies each time. If there 
were limits on how many enemies could be controlled, and the duration
 were more stable, this could be a useful spell.

I agree.  Also, I'd like to place limits on when it could be used.  If 
there are 10 or fewer opponents, there isn't a need for mind-control.

> Summon elemental needs to be downgraded--it's just too
 powerful!

I'd like a limit to how many fire elementals could be summoned at a 
time, both an individual limit for each archmage and a team limit.
